name: Close to underworld
description:
Story: Several floors before the underworld. Sydney the deceased soul was damned in the underworld as a serpent creature and is trapped in this place like the other souls. Before new souls come to the underworld. The previous souls are trapped in flasks and transported to the realm of the dead by the ruler of the underworld. However, if Sydney can free herself this night. On the way, without falling into traps and abysses.  Gathering the other souls who share the same fate, but who can not free themselves from the bottles. And can proceed to the gate of light. Is allowed to climb up. Controls: Credits:

Font - Google Fonts (IM Fell Mix and Homenaje)

Skybox - Unreal Engine Texture

Lava - Unreal Engine Texture

Sounds:

weloveindies
